thread.section_title: World Wide Stereo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of World Wide Stereo | worldwidestereo.com
thread.title: Lowtone
thread.title_full: World Wide Stereo reviewed by Lowtone

author: Lowtone
title: Lowtone
text:
The selling price and service from WWS was great. I called ahead to confirm the estimated delivery date since I knew I might be out of town later in the week. The only thing preventing me from rating this at 5 stars is that once I tracked the delivery, I found out that a signature was required. I had to quickly run home from work B4 FedEx showed up. If I had known this at the time of the order, I could have made other arrangements.
The Project Carbon Debut turntable is a great product I am very happy with it so far.
